channel.title: Development Data Partnership
channel.description: Recent content on Development Data Partnership

item.title: Mapping Flood Hazard to Strengthen Road Infrastructure Resilience in Costa Rica
item.description: As part of a study by the Inter-American Development Bank (IDB) on the Bernardo Soto–Florencia section of Costa Rica’s National Route 35, flood exposure was assessed using global flood hazard data from JBA Global Resilience (JBA).
